title: Tinted Sunglasses
shortDescription: This is a wonderful transparent pattern.  Click on another pattern and you will see it underneath.  This transparent radial gradient is tremendous for layering.
instructions: Just a transparent radial gradient. With CSS3 you can layer multiple background images.  This pattern looks great layered. Just seperate them with commas like so: background-image:url(data:image..) , url(data:image...);
